verses.roman:
na hy etasmin kule jātā
adhanā abahu-prajāḥ
alpāyuṣo 'lpa-vīryāś ca
abrahmaṇyāś ca jajñire

synonyms: na—not; hi—indeed; etasmin—in this; kule—family; jātāḥ—appearing; adhanaḥ—poor; a-bahu—not having many; prajāḥ—children; alpa-āyuṣaḥ—short-lived; alpa—small; vīryāḥ—whose prowess; ca—and; abrahmaṇyāḥ—not devoted to the brahminical class; ca—and; jajñire—were born.
translation: No one born in this family was poor in wealth or progeny, short-lived, weak or neglectful of brahminical culture.
